統語範疇: (とうごはんちゅう) - syntactic category
統轄: (とうかつ) - unification/bringing together/generalization; (esp. 統轄) control/supervision
絵: (e) - picture , picture, drawing, painting, sketch; (video) footage, image, picture
絵づら: (えづら) - the impression given by a painting or image
絵にかいた餅: (えにかいたもち) - pie in the sky; castle in the air
絵になる: (えになる) - to (would) make a picture (similar to pretty as a picture)
絵に描いたよう: (えにえがいたよう) - the very picture of ...
絵に描いた餅: (えにかいたもち) - pie in the sky; castle in the air
絵に描いた餠: (えにかいたもち) - pie in the sky; castle in the air
絵の具: (えのぐ) - paint; coloring materials; colors; colours
絵の具を溶く: (えのぐをとく) - to dissolve colors; to dissolve colours
絵を描く: (えをえがく) - to paint (draw) a picture
絵コンテ: (えコンテ) - storyboard (film, television); design for a series of movie scenes
絵チャ: (えちゃ) - paint chat; Internet chat room where users can draw pictures
絵伝: (えでん) - biography of a monk or history of a temple told in pictures
絵入り根本: (えいりねほん) - illustrated kabuki script
絵入根本: (えいりねほん) - illustrated kabuki script
絵具: (えのぐ) - paint; coloring materials; colors; colours
絵双紙屋: (えぞうしや) - shop selling picture books, wood prints, etc.
絵師: (えし) - painter; artist; painter supported by patron
絵心: (えごころ) - artistic inclinations or taste; ability to appreciate painting; desire to paint
絵扇: (えおうぎ) - fan painted with a picture
絵手紙: (えてがみ) - letter made from a picture one has drawn
絵文字: (emoji) - emoji; símbolo pictórico, pictograma, pictograma, emoji; símbolo pictórico, pictograma, pictograma; arte ASCII
絵日傘: (えひがさ) - decorated umbrella; figured paper parasol
絵暦: (えごよみ) - traditional Japanese calendar with pictures; traditional Japanese calendar expressed with pictures for use by illiterates
絵画展: (かいがてん) - art exhibition; art show
絵画館: (かいがかん) - art or picture gallery
絵看板: (えかんばん) - signboard depicting scene from a play (usu. outside a theatre)
絵組: (えぐみ) - structure of an artwork/pictorial design; pictures inserted in a book
絵組み: (えぐみ) - structure of an artwork/pictorial design; pictures inserted in a book
絵羽模様: (えばもよう) - single pattern on the entirety of a garment
絵草紙屋: (えぞうしや) - shop selling picture books, wood prints, etc.
絵蝋燭: (えろうそく) - candle decorated with pictures, e.g. of colored birds and flowers
絵解き: (えとき) - explanation of a picture; explanation by pictures
絵面: (えづら) - the impression given by a painting or image
絵馬堂: (えまどう) - shrine building where votive picture tablets are hanged
絵馬殿: (えまでん) - shrine building where votive picture tablets are hanged
絶えざる: (たえざる) - constant; incessant; without break; continuous
絶えてしまった種: (たえてしまったしゅ) - extinct species
絶える: (たえる) - to die out/to peter out/to become extinct; to cease/to be stopped/to be discontinued/to be cut off
絶え果てる: (たえはてる) - to be extinguished; to be exterminated; to cease completely
絶え間ない: (たえまない) - incessant; constant; continuous; perpetual; everlasting
絶え間なく: (たえまなく) - incessantly; without a pause
絶え間無く: (たえまなく) - incessantly; without a pause
絶する: (ぜっする) - to be unspeakable; to be unimaginable
絶ちきる: (たちきる) - to cut apart (cloth, paper, etc.); (断ち切る, 断切る only) to sever (ties)/to break off (a relationship); (断ち切る, 断切る only) to cut off (an enemy's retreat)/to block (a road, etc.)/to disconnect
絶つ: (たつ) - to sever; to cut off; to suppress; to abstain (from)
